description: Module to manage VM pools in oVirt/RHV.

name.description: Name of the VM pool to manage.

wait.description: I(True) if the module should wait for the entity to get into desired state.

poll_interval.description: Number of the seconds the module waits until another poll request on entity status is sent.

fetch_nested.description: If I(True) the module will fetch additional data from the API.

nested_attributes.description: Specifies list of the attributes which should be fetched from the API.

vm_per_user.description: Maximum number of VMs a single user can attach to from this pool.

cluster.description: Name of the cluster, where VM pool should be created.

state.description: Should the VM pool be present/absent.

prestarted.description: Number of pre-started VMs defines the number of VMs in run state, that are waiting to be attached to Users.

auth.description: Dictionary with values needed to create HTTP/HTTPS connection to oVirt:

timeout.description: The amount of time in seconds the module should wait for the instance to get into desired state.

template.description: Name of the template, which will be used to create VM pool.

vm_count.description: Number of VMs in the pool.

type.description: Type of the VM pool. Either manual or automatic.
